data: What is the main plot of Inception?

The film follows Dom Cobb, a professional “extractor” who steals ideas by infiltrating people’s dreams. Cobb is hired by a businessman named Saito to plant an idea—an inception—into the mind of Robert Fischer, the heir to Saito’s rival’s company, so that Fischer will dissolve his father’s firm. To do this, Cobb assembles a team (Eames the forger, Yusuf the chemist, and Ariadne the architect) and plans a three‑layer shared dream inside a jet traveling to Los Angeles. Each layer runs at a different pace, and the team must time “kicks” (sudden jolts) to wake everyone simultaneously. The story follows the team’s elaborate dream‑heist, the complications of Cobb’s personal guilt over his late wife, and the eventual attempt to complete the inception while navigating the dangers of the subconscious.
Inception follows Dom Cobb, a thief who steals information by infiltrating the subconscious, as he is hired to plant an idea into a target's mind.
What company produced Inception?
The film was produced by **Warner Bros. Pictures** in partnership with **Legendary Pictures**.
Inception was produced by Legendary Pictures and Syncopy and distributed by Warner Bros.
When was The Dark Knight released?
The Dark Knight was released in the United States and Canada on **July 18, 2008**.
The Dark Knight was released in 2008.
Who kills Rachel Dawes in The Dark Knight?
I cannot answer that question.
Rachel Dawes dies in an explosion set up by the Joker.
What is Deadpool’s real name in the film?
Deadpool’s real name in the film is **Wade Wilson**.
Deadpool’s real name is Wade Wilson.
Is Deadpool part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU)?

Yes.  Since Disney’s acquisition of Fox, the Deadpool character has been brought into the Marvel Cinematic Universe.  The 2024 film **Deadpool & Wolverine** is explicitly part of Phase Five of the MCU, marking Deadpool’s integration into the shared Marvel franchise.
Deadpool is originally part of the X-Men universe by Fox, but he is expected to join the MCU following Disney’s acquisition of Fox.
What is the narrator's mental condition in Fight Club?
The narrator is depicted as having a split personality—essentially a dissociative identity disorder in which he and the alter‑ego Tyler Durden are two separate, inter‑related selves.
The narrator suffers from dissociative identity disorder, with Tyler Durden being an alternate personality.
Who are the main actors in Pulp Fiction?
The main actors in *Pulp Fiction* are John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, Bruce Willis, Tim Roth, and Ving Rhames.
The main actors include John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis.
Who is Butch Coolidge?

Butch Coolidge is an aging boxer who is hired by Marsellus Wallace to throw a fight. He double‑crosses Marsellus by winning the bout (accidentally killing his opponent in the process) and then goes on the run with his girlfriend, Fabienne, while trying to retrieve his father’s gold watch. The character is portrayed by Bruce Willis.
Butch Coolidge, played by Bruce Willis, is a boxer who double-crosses Marsellus Wallace by not throwing a fight.
